# definition

**Instance Property**

The timeframe, target object, and visual semantics of the animation.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor @preconcurrency var definition: any AnimationDefinition { get }
```

## Inspecting animation information

- **name**: The name of the animation resource.
- **AnimationFillMode**: Options that determine which animation frames display outside of the normal duration.
